metadata.name: AP Royal Oak Blue 2021 Date 39mm 15202ST.OO.1240ST.01 Audemars Piguet - Full Boxes & Papers
metadata.description:
This highly prestigious Audemars Piguet Selfwinding Royal Oak 15202ST.OO.1240ST.01 is a "Jumbo" extra-thin iteration of its flagship model. This stunning timepiece features a stainless steel case and bezel, blue dial, stainless steel bracelet with an AP folding clasp, caliber 2121 movement, and date display. Its case has a 39 mm diameter, 8.1 mm thickness, glareproofed sapphire crystal, and is water resistant up to 50 meters (165 feet). The AP 15202ST's unique dial has a "Petite Tapisserie" pattern, white gold applied hour-markers, and Royal Oak hands with luminescent coating. It has a 36 jewel powered movement, 40 hour power reserve, and frequency of 2.75 Hz (19,800 vph). This wristwatch comes with its original box and paperwork.

Our team has authenticated and ranked the condition of this wristwatch a grade of 5.0 out of 5.0.

Any NFT issued by 4K is redeemable for its physical counterpart anytime. To redeem, go to 4K.com. If you have any questions, you can reach us at help@4k.com.
